title: Bird flu confirmed at Hummelo hobby farm; Roughly 150 birds to be culled
title_zh: Hummelo 业余农场确诊禽流感；约 150 只禽鸟将被扑杀
description: The Dutch Food and Consumer Product Safety Authority (NVWA) is culling all 150 birds at a hobby farm in Hummelo to prevent the further spread of avian influenza, marking the second outbreak in Geld
description_zh: 荷兰食品和消费品安全局 (NVWA) 正在扑杀 Hummelo 一家业余农场的所有 150 只禽鸟，以防止禽流感进一步蔓延，这是 Geld 第二次爆发禽流感疫情

title: Mayor Halsema unveils 3D model of Amsterdam in honor of city’s 750th anniversary
title_zh: 市长 Halsema 推出阿姆斯特丹 3D 模型，以纪念该市成立 750 周年
description: Mayor Femke Halsema unveiled a 70-square-meter, 3D-printed model of Amsterdam Friday at the World Trade Center (WTC) Amsterdam to mark the city’s 750th anniversary.
description_zh: 周五，阿姆斯特丹市长费姆克·哈尔斯玛 (Femke Halsema) 在阿姆斯特丹世界贸易中心 (WTC) 揭开了一座 70 平方米的阿姆斯特丹 3D 打印模型，以纪念该市成立 750 周年。

title: Primatologist Jane Goodall’s final speech to premiere at film festival in Amsterdam
title_zh: 灵长类动物学家珍·古道尔的最后演讲将在阿姆斯特丹电影节首映
description: The final public speech of primatologist and conservationist Jane Goodall will be shown for the first time at a Dutch film festival next month, festival organizers announced Friday.
description_zh: 电影节组织者周五宣布，灵长类动物学家和自然资源保护者珍妮·古道尔的最后一次公开演讲将于下个月在荷兰电影节上首次放映。

title: Pop a pill art? Amsterdam show features ecstasy pill designs
title_zh: 摇头丸艺术？阿姆斯特丹展览展出摇头丸设计
description: When is an XTC pill more than just a pill? According to marketing expert Adam Fierman, when it is pop...
description_zh: XTC 药丸什么时候不再只是一颗药丸？营销专家 Adam Fierman 认为，当它流行起来时……

title: Clocks to fall back one hour Sunday at  3 a.m. as daylight saving debate continues
title_zh: 夏令时争论仍在继续，时钟将于周日凌晨 3 点拨慢一小时
description: On Sunday, October 26, 2025, the Netherlands will move its clocks back one hour at 3 a.m., marking the end of daylight saving time.
description_zh: 2025 年 10 月 26 日星期日，荷兰将在凌晨 3 点将时钟拨回一小时，标志着夏令时结束。

title: Election watch: BBB on Islamic schools, a deal on LGBTI rights
title_zh: 选举观察：BBB 就伊斯兰学校、LGBTI 权利达成协议
description: Some 13.4 million people can vote in the Dutch general election in four days time. Here’s a round-up of the...
description_zh: 四天后，约有1340万人将参加荷兰大选投票。以下是投票概要……

title: Major fire breaks out at Moerdijk composting facility, residents warned to stay indoors
title_zh: 莫尔代克堆肥设施发生严重火灾，居民被警告留在室内
description: A large fire broke out early Saturday at a composting company on the Moerdijk industrial estate in Noord-Brabant, authorities reported.
description_zh: 据有关部门报道，周六凌晨，北布拉班特省莫尔代克工业区的一家堆肥公司发生大火。

title: Man on moped killed in collision with car in Wormerveer; Driver arrested for questioning
title_zh: 沃尔默维尔一名骑摩托车的男子与汽车相撞身亡；司机被捕接受调查
description: A 28-year-old man from the municipality of Zaanstad was killed early Saturday after his moped collided with a car on Wandelweg in Wormerveer, police said.
description_zh: 警方称，周六凌晨，一名来自赞斯塔德市的 28 岁男子在沃尔默维尔的 Wandelweg 骑轻便摩托车与一辆汽车相撞身亡。

title: Seven Dutch parties pledge stronger LGBTQ+ rights and protections
title_zh: 荷兰七个政党承诺加强 LGBTQ+ 权利和保护
description: Seven Dutch parties signed COC’s new rainbow election pact, known in Dutch as the rainbow election pact (regenboog-stembusakkoord), on Saturday, pledging stronger protection, equality, and human ri
description_zh: 荷兰七个政党于周六签署了荷兰选举委员会的新彩虹选举协议，即《彩虹选举协议》（荷兰语：regenboog-stembusakkoord），承诺加强保护、平等和人权

title: UAE extradites Dutch citizen to serve 4.3-year sentence for cocaine, amphetamine crimes
title_zh: 阿联酋引渡荷兰公民，因可卡因、安非他明犯罪被判处4.3年徒刑
description: The United Arab Emirates have extradited a 41-year-old Dutch man from Nieuw-Vennep to the Netherlands, the Public Prosecution Service (OM)
description_zh: 阿联酋已将一名 41 岁的荷兰男子从新芬内普引渡回荷兰，荷兰检察院 (OM) 表示

title: Air France-KLM finalizes stake purchase in Canada’s WestJet
title_zh: 法航荷航完成收购加拿大西捷航空股份
description: Air France-KLM has finalized the purchase of a partial stake in Canadian airline WestJet, becoming one of three major carriers to acquire shares from investment firm Onex Partners.
description_zh: 法航荷航集团已完成收购加拿大航空公司西捷航空的部分股份，成为从投资公司 Onex Partners 收购股份的三大航空公司之一。

title: Dutch parties split over deporting dual-nationality criminals
title_zh: 荷兰两党在驱逐双重国籍罪犯问题上出现分歧
description: A debate over whether criminals with dual nationality convicted of serious crimes should be deported has exposed sharp divisions among Dutch political parties.
description_zh: 关于是否应将犯有严重罪行的双重国籍罪犯驱逐出境的辩论暴露了荷兰各政党之间的严重分歧。

title: Police suspect 80-year-old Amsterdam woman was killed by fake officers in August
title_zh: 警方怀疑阿姆斯特丹一名 80 岁妇女于 8 月遭假警察杀害
description: The 80-year-old womanfound deadin her Amsterdam Nieuw-West apartment in m
description_zh: 一名 80 岁妇女被发现死于阿姆斯特丹新西区的公寓中

title: Dutch voters can cast ballots at unique locations such as stadiums and women's prision
title_zh: 荷兰选民可以在体育场和女子监狱等特殊地点投票
description: Dutch voters will be able to cast their ballots at unique locations for theTweede Kamer elections on Octobe
description_zh: 荷兰选民将能够在 10 月举行的 Tweede Kamer 选举中在特殊地点投票。

title: Dutch insurer warns of possible spike in car crashes after winter time change on Sunday
title_zh: 荷兰保险公司警告称，周日冬令时调整后车祸数量可能激增
description: When the Netherlands moves its clocks back one hour at 3 a.m. on Sunday, October 26, drivers are being urged to stay extra alert in the days that follow.
description_zh: 荷兰将于 10 月 26 日星期日凌晨 3 点将时钟拨回一小时，并敦促司机在接下来的几天里保持格外警惕。

title: Vandalism at Beuningen shelter for unaccompanied minors, police seek witnesses
title_zh: 伯宁恩无人陪伴未成年人收容所遭破坏，警方寻求目击者
description: Windows were smashed Thursday evening at a building designated to house unaccompanied minor refugees in Beuningen, prompting a police investigation,
description_zh: 周四晚上，伯宁恩一栋专门收容无人陪伴未成年难民的建筑物的窗户被砸碎，引发警方调查。

title: Netherlands residents' trust in politics historically low
title_zh: 荷兰居民对政治的信任度历史最低
description: Netherlands residents’ trust in politics is at a historic low.
description_zh: 荷兰居民对政治的信任度处于历史低位。

title: Range Rover torched at Den Bosch supermarket two days after makeshift bomb discovery
title_zh: 路虎揽胜在丹博斯超市被发现临时炸弹两天后被焚毁
description: A Range Rover parked outside supermarket Dunya on Churchilllaan in Den Bosch went up in flames around 11:15 p.m.
description_zh: 晚上 11 点 15 分左右，一辆停在 Den Bosch Churchilllaan 超市 Dunya 外的路虎揽胜发生火灾

title: ADE speakers outline the Middle East conflict’s impact on music
title_zh: ADE 发言人概述中东冲突对音乐的影响
description: The situation in the Middle East is having a financial impact on the music industry, with pro-Palestinian artists cancelling on...
description_zh: 中东局势对音乐产业产生了财务影响，亲巴勒斯坦艺术家取消了演出……

title: Dutch consumer spending rises slightly, ING data shows
title_zh: 荷兰国际集团数据显示，荷兰消费者支出略有上升
description: After months of restraint, Dutch consumers seem to be increasing their spending slightly, according to ING researchers analyzing the bank’s transaction data.
description_zh: 荷兰银行（ING）研究人员对银行交易数据的分析显示，经过数月的克制之后，荷兰消费者的支出似乎略有增加。

title: Why Geert Wilders won’t be the next Dutch prime minister
title_zh: 为什么 Geert Wilders 不会成为下一任荷兰首相
description: With less than week to go until the Dutch general election, the international spotlight is again falling on Geert Wilders,...
description_zh: 距离荷兰大选不到一周，国际社会的焦点再次集中在吉尔特·威尔德斯身上……

title: Two men convicted for projecting discriminatory slogans on building in Bodegraven
title_zh: 两名男子因在博德赫拉芬的建筑物上投射歧视性口号而被判刑
description: A court in The Hague has sentenced two men to community service for projecting discriminatory messages onto a building along the A12 in Bodegraven. A third suspect was acquitted.
description_zh: 海牙一家法院判处两名男子社区服务，罪名是向博德赫拉芬A12公路沿线的一栋建筑投射歧视性文字。第三名嫌疑人被无罪释放。

title: Dutch oncologists praise study showing mRNA vaccines may aid cancer therapy
title_zh: 荷兰肿瘤学家称赞mRNA疫苗可能有助于癌症治疗的研究
description: Dutch doctors and their professional organizations have described the results of research into the influence of the mRNA coronavirus vaccines on the effectiveness of certain cancer treatments as “i
description_zh: 荷兰医生及其专业组织将有关 mRNA 冠状病毒疫苗对某些癌症治疗效果影响的研究结果描述为“

title: Rotterdam police officer fired, arrested over multiple sexual offenses
title_zh: 鹿特丹一名警察因多项性侵犯被解雇并被捕
description: A police officer in Rotterdam has been fired for “serious dereliction of duty.” He is in custody on suspicion of multiple sexual offenses.
description_zh: 鹿特丹一名警官因“严重失职”被解雇。他因涉嫌多起性犯罪而被拘留。

title: "Incomprehensible," prosecutor says about teacher's stabbing at primary school musical
title_zh: 检察官称小学音乐剧中老师持刀伤人事件“令人费解”
description: “What type of family member would go to a primary school’s end-of-year musical with a knife?
description_zh: “什么样的家庭成员会带着刀去参加小学的年终音乐剧？

title: German police arrest forgery gang that claimed Rijksmuseum Rembrandt was fake
title_zh: 德国警方逮捕伪造团伙，称国立博物馆伦勃朗作品为赝品
description: German authorities have dismantled a gang of art forgers who created counterfeit works by artists including Rembrandt and Pablo Picasso.
description_zh: 德国当局捣毁了一个艺术品伪造团伙，该团伙伪造了伦勃朗和巴勃罗·毕加索等艺术家的作品。

title: New homes won’t bring prices down anytime soon, warns ABN Amro
title_zh: 荷兰银行警告称，新房不会很快降低房价
description: More new construction will not lead to lower house prices in the short term, ABN Amro says in a special edition of its housing market monitor ahead of the parliamentary elections on October 29.
description_zh: 荷兰银行在 10 月 29 日议会选举前发布的房地产市场监测特别版中表示，短期内新增建筑不会导致房价下降。

title: Missing Alkmaar man, 25, found dead; Two held on suspicion of murder or manslaughter
title_zh: 失踪的 25 岁阿尔克马尔男子被发现死亡；两人因涉嫌谋杀或过失杀人被捕
description: Authorities have confirmed that Tijn, a 25-year-old from Alkmaar who had been missing since mid-September, has been found dead.
description_zh: 当局已证实，9 月中旬失踪的 25 岁阿尔克马尔人 Tijn 已被发现死亡。

title: Utrecht allows police to stop and frisk ahead of anti-asylum, anti-fascism protests
title_zh: 乌得勒支允许警察在反庇护、反法西斯抗议活动前拦截并搜身
description: A part of Utrecht, including the city center, will be designated a security risk area on Sunday due to planned demonstrations, the mayor said in a council letter.
description_zh: 乌得勒支市长在一封议会信中表示，由于计划举行的示威活动，乌得勒支部分地区（包括市中心）将于周日被指定为安全风险区。

title: NS gets green light to give some security staff batons
title_zh: 国民警卫队获准向部分安保人员发放警棍
description: Some Dutch railway security staff are to be allowed to carry batons in a trial aimed at improving their safety,...
description_zh: 为提高荷兰铁路安保人员的安全性，一些荷兰铁路安保人员将被允许携带警棍......

title: Moving city: interactive model of 750-year-old Amsterdam opens
title_zh: 流动的城市：拥有750年历史的阿姆斯特丹互动模型开放
description: Before your eyes, the tiny 13th century village of Amsterdam emerges from the water. A dam appears on this drained...
description_zh: 在你眼前，13世纪的阿姆斯特丹小村从水中浮现。这座干涸的河床上出现了一座水坝……

title: PostNL to raise stamp price to 1.40 euros amid rising costs
title_zh: 荷兰邮政将邮票价格上调至 1.40 欧元以应对成本上涨
description: PostNL is raising the price of a postage stamp to 1.40 euros next year, up from 1.31 euros. This comes after the price had also been raised by 10 percent in July of this year.
description_zh: 荷兰邮政明年将把邮票价格从每张1.31欧元上调至1.40欧元。此前，该价格已于今年7月上调10%。

title: Shell faces lawsuit from Filipino survivors over typhoon Odette
title_zh: 壳牌因台风奥德特面临菲律宾幸存者的诉讼
description: A group of 67 Filipinos has filed a lawsuit in the United Kingdom accusing Shell of contributing to the formation of Typhoon Odette in the Philippines.
description_zh: 67名菲律宾人在英国提起诉讼，指控壳牌公司导致菲律宾形成台风奥杰特。

title: Financial stress at home costs Dutch children a month of classroom time annually
title_zh: 家庭经济压力导致荷兰儿童每年损失一个月的课堂时间
description: Financial stress at home is causing Dutch children to lose nearly a month of adequate classroom time annually, a study by SEO Economic Research (SEO Economisch Onderzoek) shows.
description_zh: SEO 经济研究 (SEO Economisch Onderzoek) 的一项研究显示，家庭经济压力导致荷兰儿童每年失去近一个月的充足课堂时间。

title: “Ban electric bikes for under 12s to boost fitness,” say experts
title_zh: 专家建议“禁止12岁以下儿童骑电动自行车，以增强体质”
description: Children under the age of 12 should be banned from using electric bicycles to prevent accidents and make sure they...
description_zh: 应禁止 12 岁以下儿童使用电动自行车，以防止发生事故并确保他们……

title: NS to arm some enforcement officers with batons in two-year trial
title_zh: 国家安全局在为期两年的试验中为一些执法人员配备警棍
description: The Dutch government has approved a plan allowing NS to arm some of its enforcement officers with batons.
description_zh: 荷兰政府已批准一项计划，允许国家警察为部分执法人员配备警棍。

title: Podcast: The Poorly Polling Palingpopulist Edition
title_zh: 播客：民调不佳的 Palingpopulist 版
description: Want to support the DutchNews podcast and keep up our stocks of stroopwafels and orange tompouces? Click here to become...
description_zh: 想要支持 DutchNews 播客并持续供应我们的荷兰焦糖华夫饼和橙子番茄酱吗？点击此处成为……

title: More sleep this weekend as the clocks go back one hour
title_zh: 时钟往回拨一小时，周末可以多睡一会儿
description: The clocks go back one hour in the early hours of Sunday morning as the Netherlands moves into official winter...
description_zh: 随着荷兰正式进入冬季，时钟将于周日凌晨拨回一小时……

title: Sports doctors and cyclists' union want a 12-year age limit for e-bikes
title_zh: 运动医生和自行车手联盟希望将电动自行车的使用年限限制在 12 岁
description: Electric bicycles should be banned for children under the age of 12, according to sports physicians and the cyclists’ union Fietsersbond.
description_zh: 运动医生和自行车联盟 Fietsersbond 表示，应禁止 12 岁以下儿童骑电动自行车。

title: Politics bubbles created by TikTok's algorithm primarily benefit the PVV
title_zh: TikTok 算法创造的政治泡沫主要有利于自由党
description: TikTok users interested in politics can quickly become stuck in a one-sided bubble, which particularly benefits the far-right PVV and Geert Wilders, according to research by
description_zh: 根据一项研究，对政治感兴趣的 TikTok 用户很快就会陷入一边倒的泡沫，这尤其有利于极右翼政党 PVV 和 Geert Wilders。

title: Quarter of Netherlands residents don’t feel represented by politics
title_zh: 四分之一的荷兰居民认为政治没有代表他们
description: A quarter of the Dutch population does not feel represented by any political party, according to a survey by Kieskompas and ANP, completed by over 13,000 people.
description_zh: 根据 Kieskompas 和 ANP 开展的一项调查，超过 13,000 人参与了该调查，四分之一的荷兰人认为没有任何政党代表他们的利益。

title: Election debate: “Will you be with us all evening, Mr Wilders”?
title_zh: 选举辩论：“威尔德斯先生，您整个晚上都会和我们在一起吗？”
description: Thursday evening’s election debate on commercial broadcaster SBS was the most-watched discussion to date, with over two million people tuning...
description_zh: 周四晚上商业广播公司 SBS 的选举辩论是迄今为止收视率最高的辩论，有超过 200 万人收看……

title: Election watch: political donations and the vegan streaker
title_zh: 选举观察：政治捐款与纯素食裸奔者
description: The Netherlands will elect 150 members of the lower house of parliament in five days time. Here’s a compilation of...
description_zh: 荷兰将在五天内选举150名下议院议员。以下是选举结果汇总……

title: Dutch households with debts caused by repaying benefits tripled since pandemic
title_zh: 疫情爆发以来，因偿还福利而负债的荷兰家庭数量增加了两倍
description: The number of households with long-term debts caused by having to repay the benefits they received has almost tripled since the coronavirus pandemic, NOS
description_zh: 自新冠疫情爆发以来，因必须偿还所领取的福利而背负长期债务的家庭数量几乎增加了两倍。

title: Strong winds still delaying arriving flights at Schiphol in aftermath of Storm Benjamin
title_zh: 风暴本杰明过后，强风仍导致史基浦机场航班延误
description: Flights at Schiphol Airport are still experiencing delays on Friday morning due to a strong westerly wind in the aftermath of Storm Benjamin.
description_zh: 由于风暴本杰明过后出现强劲西风，史基浦机场周五早上的航班仍然延误。

title: Domestic violence reports rise again as awareness grows
title_zh: 随着人们意识的增强，家庭暴力报告再次上升
description: Reports of domestic violence in the Netherlands rose again in the first half of 2025, according to new figures from...
description_zh: 根据最新数据，2025 年上半年荷兰家庭暴力报告数量再次上升......

title: More people face financial problems paying back benefits
title_zh: 更多人面临偿还福利的财务问题
description: An increasing number of people are getting into financial difficulty because they have to repay top-up housing, childcare and healthcare...
description_zh: 越来越多的人陷入财务困境，因为他们必须偿还补充住房、儿童保育和医疗费用……

title: First election debate with PVV focused mostly on excluding "deserter" Wilders
title_zh: 与自由党的首次选举辩论主要集中在排除“逃兵”威尔德斯
description: The SBS election debate last night was the first chance for other party leaders to cross swords with PVV leader Geert Wilders this election campaign, and Frans Timmermans (GL-PvdA), Henri
description_zh: 昨晚的 SBS 选举辩论是其他党派领导人在本次竞选中首次与 PVV 领导人 Geert Wilders 交锋的机会，Frans Timmermans (GL-PvdA)、Henri

title: Go Ahead Eagles’ shock win tops three Dutch victories in Europe
title_zh: 前进之鹰队爆冷获胜，超越荷兰队在欧洲的三场胜利
description: Four Dutch football clubs were in European action on Thursday night, with the shock win of the evening going to...
description_zh: 周四晚，四家荷兰足球俱乐部参加了欧洲比赛，当晚令人震惊的胜利归于……

title: Cheers: Enschede emporium has 1,400 different whiskys on sale
title_zh: 干杯：恩斯赫德商场出售 1,400 种不同的威士忌
description: Nestled round the corner from the Rijksmuseum Twenthe in Enschede’s trendy Roombeek district is what is said to be the...
description_zh: 据说，坐落在恩斯赫德时尚的 Roombeek 区 Rijksmuseum Twenthe 拐角处...

title: The big election issues: healthcare and health insurance
title_zh: 重大选举议题：医疗保健和健康保险
description: The Netherlands goes to the polls on October 29 to elect a new government. We asked you what issues you...
description_zh: 荷兰将于10月29日举行投票，选举新政府。我们询问了您关心的问题……

title: Domestic violence reports rising steadily; 66,000 in first half of 2025
title_zh: 家庭暴力报告稳步上升；2025 年上半年将有 66,000 起
description: The number of reports of suspected child abuse and partner violence continues to rise, Statistics Netherlands (CBS) reported.
description_zh: 荷兰统计局（CBS）报告称，疑似虐待儿童和伴侣暴力的报告数量持续上升。

title: Damage caused by storm Benjamin seems limited; Mostly fallen trees, blown off roof tiles
title_zh: 风暴本杰明造成的损失似乎有限；大部分是倒下的树木和被吹落的屋顶瓦片
description: Storm Benjamin raged across the Netherlands overnight, but it seems to have caused only limited damage. As far as is known, no one got hurt.
description_zh: 风暴本杰明（Benjamin）一夜之间席卷荷兰，但似乎只造成了有限的损失。据了解，无人受伤。

title: 55% more cyclists fined for riding without lights as darker months approach
title_zh: 随着黑暗月份的临近，因不开灯骑行而被罚款的骑车人增加了 55%
description: The number of fines issued to cyclists riding without lights in the Netherlands has surged by 55 percent this summer compared with a year earlier, according to data from the Central Judicial Collec
description_zh: 根据荷兰中央司法院的数据，今年夏天，荷兰对无灯骑行者的罚款数量与去年同期相比激增了 55%。

title: Half of FvD voters oppose ban on parties that undermine the rule of law
title_zh: 半数 FvD 选民反对禁止破坏法治的政党
description: Half of the FvD voters are against a ban on Dutch political parties that undermine the rule of law, a survey conducted by Kieskompas and the ANP shows.
description_zh: 基斯孔帕斯 (Kieskompas) 和荷兰国家党 (ANP) 联合开展的一项调查显示，半数自由民主联盟 (FvD) 选民反对禁止破坏法治的荷兰政党。

title: Feyenoord claim first UEFA Europa League win with comeback against Panathinaikos
title_zh: 费耶诺德逆转战胜帕纳辛奈科斯，赢得欧联杯首场胜利
description: Feyenoord picked up their first win in the UEFA Europa League on Thursday, beating Greek side Panathinaikos 3-1 in De Kuip.
description_zh: 费耶诺德队于周四在德奎普球场以 3-1 击败希腊球队帕纳辛奈科斯队，取得了欧足联欧洲联赛的首场胜利。

title: FC Utrecht beaten 2-0 by Freiburg, remain winless in the UEFA Europa League
title_zh: 乌得勒支队以 0-2 负于弗赖堡，在欧联杯中仍未获胜
description: FC Utrecht’s dismal form in the UEFA Europa League continued on Thursday with a 2-0 loss away to German side SC Freiburg.
description_zh: 乌得勒支足球俱乐部在周四的欧足联欧洲联赛中继续表现糟糕，客场 0-2 负于德国球队弗赖堡。

title: AZ bounce back in Europe with comfortable win over Slovan Bratislava
title_zh: AZ 在欧洲赛场上强势反弹，轻松击败斯洛伐克布拉迪斯拉发
description: AZ Alkmaar returned to winning ways in the UEFA Conference League on Thursday evening with a 1-0 win over Slovan Bratislava.
description_zh: 周四晚上，阿尔克马尔队在欧洲足联联合会杯中以 1-0 战胜斯洛文布拉迪斯拉发队，重回胜利之路。

title: Benjamin the third official "storm" to hit the Netherlands this autumn; fifth this year
title_zh: 本杰明是今年秋季袭击荷兰的第三场官方“风暴”，也是今年第五场
description: Benjamin officially became the third autumnal storm to hit the Netherlands this season.
description_zh: 本杰明正式成为本季袭击荷兰的第三场秋季风暴。

title: Historic night: Go Ahead Eagles stun Aston Villa in UEFA Europa League victory
title_zh: 历史性的夜晚：前进之鹰击败阿斯顿维拉，赢得欧联杯冠军
description: Go Ahead Eagles picked up one of their most impressive victories in the club’s history on Thursday, beating English Premier League side Aston Villa in the UEFA Europa League.
description_zh: 前进之鹰队周四在欧洲联赛中击败英超球队阿斯顿维拉，取得了俱乐部历史上最令人印象深刻的胜利之一。

title: Car sales expected to fall by nearly 2 percent next year as economic concerns continue
title_zh: 由于经济担忧持续，预计明年汽车销量将下降近 2%
description: The Dutch car market is expected to remain near historically low levels through 2026, with only 361,000 new passenger cars and 40,000 light commercial vehicles projected to be registered next year,
description_zh: 预计到 2026 年，荷兰汽车市场仍将维持在历史低位附近，预计明年仅注册 361,000 辆新乘用车和 40,000 辆轻型商用车。

title: Eight human skeletons found during sewer work in Weert, Limburg
title_zh: 林堡省韦尔特的下水道施工期间发现八具人类骨骼
description: Eight human skeletons, believed to be between 200 and 500 years old, have been discovered during sewer work in Weert, Limburg.
description_zh: 在林堡省韦尔特的下水道施工期间，发现了八具人类骨骼，据信这些骨骼已有 200 至 500 年的历史。

title: Benjamin batters the Netherlands, fifth official storm this year
title_zh: 本杰明袭击荷兰，这是今年第五次官方报道的风暴
description: Storm Benjamin battered Dutch coastal areas on Thursday afternoon and evening, bringing heavy rain and gale force winds to the...
description_zh: 周四下午和晚上，风暴本杰明袭击了荷兰沿海地区，给该地区带来了暴雨和大风......

title: Dutch ‘valium rapist’ sentenced to nine years in Bulgaria for brutal assault
title_zh: 荷兰“安定强奸犯”因残忍袭击在保加利亚被判处九年徒刑
description: Johan S., a 44-year-old Dutch man from Sassenheim known as the “Valium rapist” for drugging women before raping them, was sentenced to nine years in prison in Sofia, Bulgaria, for the rape and assa
description_zh: 约翰·S.，一名来自萨森海姆的 44 岁荷兰男子，因在强奸妇女前给她们下药而被称为“安定强奸犯”，因强奸和谋杀罪在保加利亚索非亚被判处九年监禁

title: Absenteeism in the Netherlands rises to highest level in years, driven by stress and flu
title_zh: 受压力和流感影响，荷兰旷工率升至多年来最高水平
description: The average sickness absence rate increased to 4.7 percent last month, compared to 4.4 percent in August, the highest level recorded in years, according to occupational health services ArboNed and
description_zh: 根据职业健康服务机构 ArboNed 和

title: Majority of scientists remain in or come back to Netherlands after time abroad
title_zh: 大多数科学家在国外工作后留在荷兰或返回荷兰
description: The majority of scientists remain in the Netherlands or return after a period abroad, according to a new report from the Rathenau Institute.
description_zh: 根据拉特瑙研究所的一份新报告，大多数科学家留在荷兰或在国外待一段时间后回国。

title: Rush hour traffic jams top 900 km during Storm Benjamin; High-speed trains scrapped
title_zh: 风暴本杰明期间，高峰时段交通拥堵长达 900 公里；高速列车被取消
description: Rush hour traffic peaked at over 900 kilometers of traffic jams just before 5:30 p.m., as workers tried to make it home before Storm Benjamin hit the Netherlands on Thursday.
description_zh: 下午 5 点 30 分之前，交通高峰期的交通堵塞长度达到 900 多公里，工人们试图在周四风暴本杰明袭击荷兰之前回家。

title: Dutch abortions hold steady at 39,000, teen procedures decrease
title_zh: 荷兰堕胎数量稳定在 39,000 例，青少年堕胎数量减少
description: The Netherlands recorded roughly 39,000 abortions in 2024, virtually unchanged from 2023, while procedures among teenagers dropped to 2,800, down 76 from the previous year,
description_zh: 荷兰 2024 年记录了约 39,000 例堕胎，与 2023 年相比几乎没有变化，而青少年堕胎数量下降至 2,800 例，比上一年减少了 76 例。

title: Dutch PM: Nexperia measures target CEO mismanagement, not China
title_zh: 荷兰首相：Nexperia 的措施针对的是 CEO 的管理不善，而非中国
description: The measures the Netherlands hastaken against chipmaker Nexperiaare “about the CEO’s
description_zh: 荷兰针对芯片制造商 Nexperia 采取的措施是“关于首席执行官的

title: Eindhoven reaches 250,000 residents as city continues to grow
title_zh: 随着城市不断发展，埃因霍温居民人数已达 25 万
description: Eindhoven has passed the milestone of 250,000 residents, the Netherlands’ fifth biggest city announced on Thursday. The population has been...
description_zh: 荷兰第五大城市埃因霍温周四宣布，该市居民人数已突破25万大关。人口……

title: Another Dutch member of sadistic "Com" accused of forcing self-mutilation, sextortion
title_zh: 另一名荷兰虐待狂“Com”成员被指控强迫自残、性勒索
description: The police arrested another member of the sadistic Com movement, specifically the 764 group, on October 14.
description_zh: 10 月 14 日，警方逮捕了虐待狂 Com 运动（具体来说是 764 组织）的另一名成员。

title: Storm Benjamin: 158 Schiphol flights canceled; Train schedule adjusted
title_zh: 风暴本杰明：史基浦机场158个航班取消；列车时刻表调整
description: Storm Benjamin is about to make landfall in Zeeland. Rail and road managers and airlines are all expecting problems from the strong winds.
description_zh: 风暴本杰明即将登陆泽兰省。铁路、公路管理人员以及航空公司都预计强风会带来问题。

title: Plans for 500,000 homes at risk of delay due to nitrogen and grid constraints
title_zh: 因氮气和电网限制，50 万套住房建设计划面临延误风险
description: The building of around 500,000 homes could stall in the coming years, primarily because of the nitrogen impasse and an overburdened electricity network.
description_zh: 未来几年，约 50 万套住房的建设可能会停滞，主要原因是氮气僵局和电网负担过重。

title: Why Dutch-Morrocan players opt for Moroccan national team: NOS
title_zh: NOS：荷兰-摩洛哥球员为何选择摩洛哥国家队
description: The rise of the far right is one of the reasons why young Dutch Moroccan footballers are opting to play...
description_zh: 极右翼势力的崛起是荷兰摩洛哥年轻足球运动员选择踢球的原因之一......

title: Man jailed for drunken King’s Day rape in Amsterdam
title_zh: 男子因在阿姆斯特丹国王节醉酒强奸被判入狱
description: An Italian national has been sentenced to 18 months in prison, six of them suspended, for raping an Irish woman...
description_zh: 一名意大利公民因强奸一名爱尔兰妇女被判处 18 个月监禁，其中 6 个月缓刑......

title: Italian man to spend 1 year in prison for raping woman on Amsterdam street on King's Day
title_zh: 意大利男子因国王节在阿姆斯特丹街头强奸女子被判入狱一年
description: The Amsterdam court sentenced Sirio S.
description_zh: 阿姆斯特丹法院判处 Sirio S.

title: Nearly 200 Schiphol flights cancelled due to Storm Benjamin; Europa League matches hit
title_zh: 受风暴本杰明影响，史基浦机场近 200 个航班取消；欧联杯比赛受影响
description: Travelers at Amsterdam’s Schiphol Airport can expect delays and cancellations Thursday asStorm
description_zh: 周四，阿姆斯特丹史基浦机场的旅客可能会遭遇航班延误和取消，因为风暴
